analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa gzung bar bya ba ni /

original: de'i yang zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: zla ba gnyis kyi yid kyis shes pa'o // des na gal te bum pa la sogs par rnam par @244a * //

original: phyis don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyis don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: des na ka ba la sogs pa'i yul can lings gcig tu snang ba'i shes pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it follows that the cognition of the object, such as a pillar, etc., appears as a single whole.

original: ci ste 'di la tshad ma med do zhes bya ba ka ba la sogs pa'i yul gyi shes pa'i gzhal bya bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa la tshad ma med do //
analyzed: ci ste 'di la tshad ma med do zhes bya ba ka ba la sogs pa'i yul gyi shes pa'i gzhal bya bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa la tshad ma med do //
translated: If you say that there is no valid cognition in this case, the object of the cognition of the object, such as a pillar, etc., is explained to have the characteristic of the cognized, but there is no valid cognition.

original: rdul phra rab kyi rnam pa can gyi shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du nye bar mtshon pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi rnam pa can gyi shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du nye bar mtshon pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: The cognition that has the form of an atom is never perceived.

original: 'di la grub pa'i mtha' pas brjod pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la grub pa'i mtha' pas brjod pa ni de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The master of the doctrine states: â€œIn that case, etc. â€

original: de la yang dang po ni zla ba gcig gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyes so zhes bya ba 'dir tshad ma med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la yang dang po ni zla ba gcig gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyes so zhes bya ba 'dir tshad ma med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The first is not without a valid cognition, in the sense that the cognition having the aspect of one moon has arisen.

original: dbang po la brten pa yang zhes bya ba ni dang por skyes pa zla ba gcig gi rnam pa can no //ğŸ”½dngos su'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dbang po rnam par 'gyur na /

analyzed: dngos su rnam par 'gyur ba de ni dbang po @244b la brten pa yin na /

analyzed: zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa ni brgyud nas rnam par 'gyur ba yin te /

analyzed: 'di 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba zla ba gcig gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa la rnam par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro ;

analyzed: / gal te dpe tsam gyis bsgrub bya 'grub na /

analyzed: de'i tshe dbang po la rten nyid du 'dod pa zla ba gcig gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa de yang yid nyid yin par thal te /

analyzed: des na dbang po las skyes pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba gzhan la brten par bya ba la /

analyzed: de yang rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir yid yin pas thugs pa med do //
translated: And since that is a transformation, it would be mind, so there would be no mental consciousness.

analyzed: 'di nyid cas bya ba ni zla ba gnyis kyi rnam pa can nyid dbang po las skyes pa yin no //

original: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa yang ldog go snyam na /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa yang ldog go snyam na /

analyzed: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: brjod pa dang bral ba yin te zhes bya ba ni thams cad la bar du gcod pa'i goms pa yod pa yin no zhes brjod par nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œIt is free from expressionâ€ means that it is possible to say that there is a habitual tendency to misapprehend everything.

analyzed: gal te goms pas skyed pa sgrub pa la sogs pa 'khrul pa yang rnam par rtog pa med pa yin la /

analyzed: sprul du 'khrul pa'i yid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang chu la sogs pa 'khrul pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the conceptual mental consciousness that is deluded with respect to a magical creation, and what is the delusion of water, etc.?

original: gzhan dag la yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: â€œIn other casesâ€ refers to

analyzed: yongs su gsal bar snang mi 'gyur //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba la sogs pa la'o //
translated: â€œit does not appear clearly.â€

original: slob dpon gyis mngon sum ltar snang ba rnam pa gnyis nyid bstan to zhes bya bar ji ltar shes snyam na'o zhes bya bas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis mngon sum ltar snang ba rnam pa gnyis nyid bstan to zhes bya bar ji ltar shes snyam na'o zhes bya bas zhes gsungs so //
translated: The master [DharmakÄ«rti] says, It is like this: the two types of seeming direct perception are taught. How do we know this? He says, Thus...

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te rnam pa gnyis su mi bzhed nas zhes sogs shig tu gcod par ston pa ni /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te rnam pa gnyis su mi bzhed nas zhes sogs shig tu gcod par ston pa ni /
translated: If it were not so, that is, if he did not assert two types, he would not have said, Thus... and so on.

original: mi mkhas pa brjod pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi mkhas pa brjod pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: He would be the cause of the expression, unskilled.

original: 'khrul pa'i shes pas 'khrul pa nyid ni yid kyi 'khrul pa ste /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i shes pas 'khrul pa nyid ni yid kyi 'khrul pa ste /
translated: The delusion of the mind is the delusion of a mistaken consciousness.

original: mi gsal ba'i rnam pa'i yul can yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa ni /
analyzed: mi gsal ba'i rnam pa'i yul can yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa ni /
translated: It is said to be a subject that has an unclear aspect. Therefore the consciousness of two moons

original: yid gnyis yin par @245b bzhed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yid gnyis yin par @245b bzhed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: is asserted to be a dual mind.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To this, the response is That...

original: gang gi zhes bya ba ni rig pa can gyi'o //
analyzed: gang gi zhes bya ba ni rig pa can gyi'o //
translated: Whose? Of the NaiyÄyikas.

original: yang ji ltar na de'i lugs dang sbyar na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na de'i lugs dang sbyar na /
translated: Again, how is it that, according to their system,

original: 'khrul pa nyid yin par gnas she na dbang po dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid yin par gnas she na dbang po dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is established as a delusion? The sense faculty... is stated.

original: dbang po dang phrad pa las byung ba'i shes pa gang yin pa de la ni /
analyzed: dbang po dang phrad pa las byung ba'i shes pa gang yin pa de la ni /
translated: That which is a cognition arisen from contact with a sense faculty

original: re zhig 'khrul pa nyid mi srid de des na lhag par gyur pas zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: re zhig 'khrul pa nyid mi srid de des na lhag par gyur pas zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ro //
translated: is not possible as mistaken, and therefore the phrase â€œbecause it is superiorâ€ and so on is applied.

original: sgra la sogs pa'i yul can gyi 'khrul pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i yul can gyi 'khrul pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the mistake that has as its object sound and so on.

original: dbang po dang don las skyes pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la ni brjod pa tha ma nyid dang / skom pa smos pas 'khrul pa la sogs pa srid pa ma yin no zhes slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po dang don las skyes pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la ni brjod pa tha ma nyid dang / skom pa smos pas 'khrul pa la sogs pa srid pa ma yin no zhes slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos brjod pa yin no //
translated: The master DignÄga says that that which is a cognition arisen from a sense faculty and an object is not possible as a mistake and so on, because it is the final expression and because it is said to be thirst.

original: des na 'khrul pa ni don smos pa nyid kyis gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa ni don smos pa nyid kyis gsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore mistake is clarified by the mere mention of an object.

original: des na don smos pa nyid de gsal ba'i phyir 'khrul pa ni yid kyi yul can kho nar rnam par gnas so zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na don smos pa nyid de gsal ba'i phyir 'khrul pa ni yid kyi yul can kho nar rnam par gnas so zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because that is clarified by the mere mention of an object, it is the intention that mistake is restricted to being the object of the mental faculty alone.

original: ngo bo brjod pa lhur byed pa nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: ngo bo brjod pa lhur byed pa nyid ston pa ni /
translated: The statement that it is the one that is the most prominent in expressing the nature is

original: dbang po dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the sense faculty and so on.

original: rang bzhin ni gang yin gzhan la mi srid pa dang de la ne /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni gang yin gzhan la mi srid pa dang de la ne /
translated: The nature of that is not possible for anything else, and it is not possible for that to be nonexistent.

original: de yang yod pa de la brjod do //
analyzed: de yang yod pa de la brjod do //
translated: And that which exists is described as that.

original: zhen pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni dbang po las skyes pa 'ga' yang mi srid pa yin te /
analyzed: zhen pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni dbang po las skyes pa 'ga' yang mi srid pa yin te /
translated: The nature of attachment is not possible for anything that arises from the sense faculties,

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even that which is nonconceptual arises from the sense faculties.

original: gzhan mngon sum ma yin par 'dod pa la yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan mngon sum ma yin par 'dod pa la yang yod pa yin te /
translated: Even for those who assert that something else is perception, it exists.

original: des na de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not said that it is inexpressible.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brjod par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brjod par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore means because it is not tenable to express it.

original: de ni mngon sum yin gyi zhes bya ba ni de kho na mngon sum yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum yin gyi zhes bya ba ni de kho na mngon sum yin pa'o //
translated: That is perception means that only that is perception.

translated: â€œIf that is so, etc.â€ means that if the uncommon is to be stated by direct perception itself, then

translated: In order to explain this, the text says, â€œWhy is it not ascertained?â€

original: tshogs par snang ba'i dngos po ni phyi rol gyi don ma yin pa ni des na de ci ltar des skyed pa yin /
analyzed: tshogs par snang ba'i dngos po ni phyi rol gyi don ma yin pa ni des na de ci ltar des skyed pa yin /

analyzed: des na shes pa de ni gang yin pa de yang gzhan gyis yod par shes par bya ba yin te /

original: des na thug pa med do //
analyzed: des na thug pa med do //

analyzed: rjes su dpag pas don gyi sngar yod pa shes pa khas len na /
translated: If you accept that the cognition of the objectâ€™s prior existence is through inference,

analyzed: rjes su dpag pa de yang mngon sum nyid las yin no //
translated: then that inference is from perception itself.

original: de lta na yang rjes su dpag pa yin /ğŸ”½mngon sum gyi rgyu can yin la /
analyzed: de lta na yang rjes su dpag pa yin / mngon sum gyi rgyu can yin la /
translated: Even so, it is inference.ğŸ”½It has perception as its cause.

original: mngon sum yang rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu can yin no //

analyzed: khyed kyi grub pa'i mtha' yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin /

original: rang gi bzhin ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //

translated: â€œLike oneâ€™s own faceâ€ means like the face of another.

original: gang du don rnams 'phros pa de ni blo yin te de ltar des blo ni ji ltar don med pa ni gzhan ni ste don rnams ni yul rung ba ma yin pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du don rnams 'phros pa de ni blo yin te de ltar des blo ni ji ltar don med pa ni gzhan ni ste don rnams ni yul rung ba ma yin pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Where the objects are reflected, that is the cognition. Thus, the cognition is not without an object, since the objects are not in an improper place.

original: de yang ni me long yang ngo //

analyzed: 'gro ba ldong bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ldongs pa ma yin te /

translated: What is the use of the cognition? The fault remains as before.

original: yang blo don med pa nyid du ston pa ni bdag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang blo don med pa nyid du ston pa ni bdag ces bya ba'o //
translated: Again, to show that the cognition is without an object, he says:

original: pha rol po dgos pa nyid yod do zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: pha rol po dgos pa nyid yod do zhes ston pa ni /
translated: The response to that is:

original: de dag gis zhes bya ba ste byed pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de dag gis zhes bya ba ste byed pa rnams kyis so //
translated: â€œTheyâ€ refers to the agents.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: â€œThisâ€ refers to the object.

original: bdag ni mngon par gsal ba 'dzin par byed pa ma yin zhing bdag gir byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag ni mngon par gsal ba 'dzin par byed pa ma yin zhing bdag gir byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The self does not grasp the manifest nor does it appropriate it,ğŸ”½because it does not become manifest.

original: mngon par gsal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon par gsal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: byed pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ni ji ltar don mi 'dzin pa'i dus na mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i dus su yang ma yin te /
analyzed: byed pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ni ji ltar don mi 'dzin pa'i dus na mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i dus su yang ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of â€œit is not an agentâ€ is that just as it does not become manifest when the object is not grasped, so it is not manifest when the object is grasped,

original: de ni rang bzhin gcig yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'i don to //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin gcig yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'i don to //
translated: because it has a single nature.

original: me long bzhin du zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'o //
analyzed: me long bzhin du zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'o //
translated: The opponentâ€™s response is: â€œIt is like a mirror.â€

original: bdag kyang don gyi rnam pa can yin mod kyi 'on kyang ji ltar me long la de'i @249a * //
analyzed: bdag kyang don gyi rnam pa can yin mod kyi 'on kyang ji ltar me long la de'i @249a * //
translated: The self also has the aspect of an object, but it is not like a mirror,ğŸ”½because it is not a collection of many subtle particles.

original: rnam pa 'byung yang rnam par 'gyur ba cung zad kyang byed pa med pa de bzhin du skyes bu yang yin no zhe na 'di 'gog pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa 'byung yang rnam par 'gyur ba cung zad kyang byed pa med pa de bzhin du skyes bu yang yin no zhe na 'di 'gog pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Just as the reflection of a form appears, but does not cause the slightest change in the form, so it is with the person.

original: bdag la brten nas de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba zhes bya ba ni med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag la brten nas de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba zhes bya ba ni med pa kho na'o //
translated: But it is not so, because the cognition having the appearance of that does not arise in dependence on the person.

original: de lta ma yin te gal te me long la brten nas de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te gal te me long la brten nas de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba ma yin na /
translated: If the cognition having the appearance of the reflection does not arise in dependence on the mirror,

original: de'i tshe 'phos pa'i don ci yin de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur ba nyid 'phos pa'i don yin gyi gzhan ni med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'phos pa'i don ci yin de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur ba nyid 'phos pa'i don yin gyi gzhan ni med do zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: then what is the meaning of the word â€œtransportedâ€? The meaning of â€œtransportedâ€ is the change in the reflection, i.e., the arising of the cognition having its appearance.

original: bdag la brtan nas de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba ni med pa kho na ste des na rnam par 'gyur ba nyid der 'phos ba'i don du brjod par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: bdag la brtan nas de'i rnam pa can gyi blo skye ba ni med pa kho na ste des na rnam par 'gyur ba nyid der 'phos ba'i don du brjod par bya ba yin na /
translated: But the cognition having the appearance of the person does not arise in dependence on the person. Therefore, the change in the reflection should be expressed as the meaning of â€œtransported.â€

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i'o //
translated: â€œHere alsoâ€ refers to the opponent.

original: de la yang rnam par 'gyur ba ci yang med la /
analyzed: de la yang rnam par 'gyur ba ci yang med la /
translated: And it does not undergo any change at all.

original: de bzhin du skyes bu la rnam par 'gyur ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du skyes bu la rnam par 'gyur ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the same way, the puruá¹£a does not undergo any change.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the objection is as follows:

original: gal te snam bu la sogs pa'i bdag nyid 'khrul pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te snam bu la sogs pa'i bdag nyid 'khrul pa yin na /
translated: If the nature of cloth, etc. is error,

original: ji ltar gtso bo dang skyes bu'i bdag nyid kyang 'khrul par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gtso bo dang skyes bu'i bdag nyid kyang 'khrul par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how can the nature of pradhÄna and puruá¹£a also be error?

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is also the case.

original: rnam gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In another way,

original: gnas skabs gzhan gyi grangs can gyi skabs kyis so //
analyzed: gnas skabs gzhan gyi grangs can gyi skabs kyis so //
translated: by the enumeration of another state, that of the SÄá¹ƒkhya.ğŸ”½This is not to be taught.

original: 'di bstan par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di bstan par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gal te rna ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te rna ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If the ear, etc.

original: des na de tha dbab las sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa rnam par gnas par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi bsam pa'o //
analyzed: des na de tha dbab las sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa rnam par gnas par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi bsam pa'o //
translated: Therefore, blue, yellow, etc. would be established from that. This is the thought of the opponent.

original: dbang po la sogs pa tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni rna ba la sogs pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni rna ba la sogs pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni dbang po la sogs pa'i tha dad pa ni'o //
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to the differences among the faculties, etc.

original: de zhes bya ba dag go //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba dag go //
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to the self.

original: rnam pa dang bcas par zhes bya ba ni gal te dbang po la sogs pas bdag skyes pa yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas par zhes bya ba ni gal te dbang po la sogs pas bdag skyes pa yin na /
translated: â€œWith a formâ€ means that if the self is produced by the faculties, etc.,

original: de'i tshe 'bras bu rgyu dang rjes su mthun par byed pa skye bar 'dod pa'i phyir bdag kyang rnam pa ngang bcas par thal lo //ğŸ”½'on te rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar dbang la sogs skye yang bdag rnam par nyid du 'dod na /

original: de lta na yang rnam pa med na /
analyzed: de lta na yang rnam pa med na /

analyzed: don so sor nges pa rnam par 'jog pa byed pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skyon de nyid du 'gyur ro //

original: de lta na yang gzhan rig pa med pas na /

translated: The second alternative is stated in the words, â€œOr, rather, the self is the experiencer.

analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa la nges pa shes na /

analyzed: yang shes par byed pa dbang po dbang po sogs pa shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir phan tshun brten pa nyid do //

original: snang ba yang sgra la sogs pa rtogs pa'i dus na /
analyzed: snang ba yang sgra la sogs pa rtogs pa'i dus na /

analyzed: ji ltar shes par byed pa yin te /

analyzed: de'i tshe med pa'i phyir ro //

translated: The response to the objection that the eye and so on are not the cause of the perception of all things is as follows:

original: de dag nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: â€œThey themselvesâ€

original: rna ba la sogs pa dag nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa dag nyid do //
translated: refers to the ear and so on.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bdag go //
translated: â€œThisâ€ refers to the self.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nges pa'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nges pa'i rnam pa yin no //

original: rnam pa las sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa las sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na /

analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i las dang 'brel pa mi 'grub ba'o //

original: de nyid sgrub pa'i don du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid sgrub pa'i don du brjod pa ni /
translated: In order to establish that very point, he says,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: â€œIf you say . . . â€

original: ci ste gzhan 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'i don dang shes pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin nyid mngon du byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ste gzhan 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'i don dang shes pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin nyid mngon du byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if the nature of something else, i.e., something other than the object and consciousness, is manifested, then what is manifested is not the object.

original: de ltar rnam par rtog pa gsum las dang po la brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog pa gsum las dang po la brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the first of the three alternatives is stated in the words, â€œIf consciousness itself is manifested. . . .â€ğŸ”½The second is stated in the words, â€œBut if the object is manifested. . . .â€ğŸ”½The third is stated in the words, â€œBut if something else is manifested. . . .â€

original: rnam par shes pa nyid mngon du byed par grangs par yin te /ğŸ”½des na mngon du byed pa de don gyi yin pa ji ltar 'gyur te /ğŸ”½mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid mngon du byed par grangs par yin te / des na mngon du byed pa de don gyi yin pa ji ltar 'gyur te / mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: The first alternative is refuted in the words, â€œBut how can consciousness be manifested?â€

original: gnyis pa nye bar bkod nas sun 'byin pa ni 'on te zhes bya'o //ğŸ”½don de zhes bya ba ni shes pa mngon du byas pa na gzhan mngon du byas par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa nye bar bkod nas sun 'byin pa ni 'on te zhes bya'o // don de zhes bya ba ni shes pa mngon du byas pa na gzhan mngon du byas par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The second is refuted in the words, â€œBut how can the object be manifested?â€

original: gsum pa la brjod pa ni gzhan la zhes bya ba'o //ğŸ”½de nyid rim gyis bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsum pa la brjod pa ni gzhan la zhes bya ba'o // de nyid rim gyis bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: The third is refuted in the words, â€œBut how can something else be manifested?â€

original: rnam par rtog pa dang po la re zhig sun 'byin pa gzhan brjod pa ni /ğŸ”½'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang po la re zhig sun 'byin pa gzhan brjod pa ni /ğŸ”½'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The first alternative is refuted in the words, â€œBut how can consciousness be manifested?â€ğŸ”½The second is refuted in the words, â€œBut how can the object be manifested?â€ğŸ”½The third is refuted in the words, â€œBut how can something else be manifested?â€

original: rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i sun 'byin pa kha skong dang bcas te /ğŸ”½brjod pa @250a * //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i sun 'byin pa kha skong dang bcas te / brjod pa @250a * //
translated: The refutation of the second alternative, together with the supplementation,ğŸ”½is stated.

original: ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement â€œBut ifâ€ is the second alternative.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'o //ğŸ”½don lta ba'i skyes bu mthong ba'i rgyu des na /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'o // don lta ba'i skyes bu mthong ba'i rgyu des na /
translated: â€œThisâ€ refers to the seeing.ğŸ”½â€œBy means of thatâ€ refers to the cause of seeing the person who sees the object.

original: don mthong ngo zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: don mthong ngo zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: â€œTherefore, the object is seenâ€ is the conclusion.

original: 'di la brjod na cis mthong zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod na cis mthong zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement â€œBut by what is this seen?â€ is the refutation.

original: 'dir gzhan gyi lan ni rang gi ngo bos so zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyi lan ni rang gi ngo bos so zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The opponentâ€™s response is â€œBy its own nature.â€

original: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa des don mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa des don mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: â€œBy means of the objectâ€™s own nature, the object is seen.â€

original: 'di la brjod pa ni 'on ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni 'on ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement â€œBut ifâ€ is the refutation of that.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni gdon mi za bar rig pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo zhes re zhig khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni gdon mi za bar rig pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo zhes re zhig khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: â€œIts own natureâ€ must be seen as having the nature of awareness.

original: de ltar ma yin te rang gi ngo bo myong ba med na thams cad mi rig par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin te rang gi ngo bo myong ba med na thams cad mi rig par thal ba'i phyir ro //

original: de bzhin du don kyang don gyi rang bzhin du mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du don kyang don gyi rang bzhin du mthong ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, the object is seen as having the nature of the object.

original: tha dad pa med pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa ni /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir brjod pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate that they are not different, he says:

original: don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: gal te don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba na don rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: If you think that when the aspect of the object is experienced, the object is not cognized,

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i zhes gsungs so //

original: de'i khyad par las zhes bya ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par las so //
analyzed: de'i khyad par las zhes bya ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par las so //
translated: The difference in that, i.e., the difference in the aspect of pleasure, etc.

original: bde ba nyid 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bde ba nyid 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni /
translated: Only pleasure, etc.

original: don ni bde ba'i rgyur nyams su myong bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don ni bde ba'i rgyur nyams su myong bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The object is not capable of being experienced as the cause of pleasure.

analyzed: gang gi phyir don la bde ba myong ba des na bde ba'i rgyu nyid du nyams su myong ba yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that because the object is experienced as pleasure, it is experienced as the cause of pleasure,

original: sngon po la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sngon po la zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says: Blue, etc.

original: mtshungs par zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: mtshungs par zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa nyid du'o //

original: gal te tshad ma'i 'bras bu de rang gi ngo bo nyid yin no //

original: grub pa'i mtha' ni 'di la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' ni 'di la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conclusion is â€œin this case.

original: gal te shes pa la byed pa zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te shes pa la byed pa zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: â€ If there is no so-called action in consciousness,

original: de'i tshe skyes bu ji ltar 'jug pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe skyes bu ji ltar 'jug pa yin zhe na /
translated: then how does a person engage in action?

original: skyes bu'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: skyes bu'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: The response is â€œthe person.

original: don gyi rig pa ni don rig pa yin na don la byed pa yang med pa'i phyir ji ltar don rig pa 'bras bu yin zhes brjod snyam na /
analyzed: don gyi rig pa ni don rig pa yin na don la byed pa yang med pa'i phyir ji ltar don rig pa 'bras bu yin zhes brjod snyam na /
translated: â€ If the awareness of an object is the awareness of an object, then since there is no action in the object, how can the awareness of an object be the effect?

original: 'di la brjod pa ni 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
translated: The response is â€œit is called the effect.

original: gal te sngon po myong ba ni sngon po'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe sngon po'i shes pa ser ba la ma 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te sngon po myong ba ni sngon po'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe sngon po'i shes pa ser ba la ma 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: â€ If the experience of blue is the nature of blue, then the consciousness of blue would not be transferred to yellow.

original: ci'i phyir gzhan gyis zhes smos so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir gzhan gyis zhes smos so //
translated: Why is it said â€œby anotherâ€?

original: rgyu des na shes pa de sngon po las tha dad par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu des na shes pa de sngon po las tha dad par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: For that reason, that consciousness is posited as different from blue.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang byed pa dang bcas par rnam par @250b 'jug pa'i rigs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang byed pa dang bcas par rnam par @250b 'jug pa'i rigs pa yang ngo //
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to the reasoning of difference and of activity.

original: deng de ma yin pa sngon po ma yin pa'i rnam pa can no //
analyzed: deng de ma yin pa sngon po ma yin pa'i rnam pa can no //
translated: It is not that, i.e., it is not blue.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nyid ji ltar 'grub snyam na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nyid ji ltar 'grub snyam na /
translated: How is the concomitance and the reverse concomitance established?

original: thog med ces gsungs so //
analyzed: thog med ces gsungs so //
translated: It is said: â€œwithout beginning.â€

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa de dag mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa de dag mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can ni ma yin no //
translated: The concomitance and the reverse concomitance are not preceded by perception.

original: rigs mi mthun pa'i shes pa snga ma gang yin pa de'i nyams su myong ba gang yin pa des gzhag pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de ni ldog pa ste /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i shes pa snga ma gang yin pa de'i nyams su myong ba gang yin pa des gzhag pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de ni ldog pa ste /
translated: The impression that is deposited by the experience of any prior cognition of a dissimilar type is the reverse concomitance.

original: tha dad pa dang byed pa'i rtogs pa'i sa bon yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang byed pa'i rtogs pa'i sa bon yin no //
translated: It is the seed of the cognition of difference and activity.

original: bag chags de yang 'ba' zhig pa ste /
analyzed: bag chags de yang 'ba' zhig pa ste /
translated: That impression is alone,

original: mngon sum dang bral ba yin na //
analyzed: mngon sum dang bral ba yin na //
translated: devoid of perception.

original: des na lor ba brgyud pa yin no //
analyzed: des na lor ba brgyud pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is transmitted from life to life.

original: des ni don gyis so //
analyzed: des ni don gyis so //
translated: It is by that.

original: de la ni shes pa la'o //
analyzed: de la ni shes pa la'o //
translated: In that, i.e., in the cognition.

original: de zhes bya ba ni pu la'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni pu la'o //
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to the impression.

original: de'i rnam pa ni pha'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ni pha'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The form of that is the form of the father.

original: 'di la ni shes pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni shes pa la'o //
translated: Here, it is in the cognition.

original: re zhig de'i rnam pa can gyi dngos po las de'i rnam pa can du gyur pa ni dmigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: re zhig de'i rnam pa can gyi dngos po las de'i rnam pa can du gyur pa ni dmigs pa nyid do //
translated: First, the thing that has the form of that is the object of that which has the form of that thing.

original: de la yang gal te mthong ba la zhes bya ba 'dod chags la sogs pa mthong ba la /
analyzed: de la yang gal te mthong ba la zhes bya ba 'dod chags la sogs pa mthong ba la /
translated: And in that, if it is said that it is in seeing, then desire, etc. are in seeing.

original: rgyu bag chags nus pa yod na de'i tshe nyams su myong ba snga ma snga ma las de'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rgyu bag chags nus pa yod na de'i tshe nyams su myong ba snga ma snga ma las de'i rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: If there is the power of the latent potentialities that are the cause, then at that time, it is the form of that from the previous experience.

original: gcig nyid la yod pa yin zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid la yod pa yin zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: It is in the one thing alone, which is not shared.

original: don ni gnas par gyur na ste phyi rol yod na ni thams cad la thun mong du skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: don ni gnas par gyur na ste phyi rol yod na ni thams cad la thun mong du skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the object exists, i.e., if the external object exists, then it arises in common to all,

original: kun gyis dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: kun gyis dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: and it is said that all would perceive it.

original: skyon brgal ba'i phyir re zhig dam 'cha' bar byed pa ni don so sor zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skyon brgal ba'i phyir re zhig dam 'cha' bar byed pa ni don so sor zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to avoid the fault of contradiction, he first makes a promise: â€œThe object is individually cognized.â€

original: 'di lta bu kho nar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'i stobs nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'di lta bu kho nar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'i stobs nyid kyis so //
translated: Only in this way is by the power of the aspect.

original: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni 'di ni 'di'i nges pa'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni 'di ni 'di'i nges pa'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad do //
translated: That itself is the convention this is the definite knowledge of that.

original: de la ni zhes bya ba so sor nges pa'i don rnam par gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba so sor nges pa'i don rnam par gnas pa la'o //
translated: There is in the meaning of individual determination that is well-established.

original: bya bsgrub par byed pa tsam ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
analyzed: bya bsgrub par byed pa tsam ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
translated: The mere performance of action is the superior.

original: de ni rgyu thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rgyu thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that exists for all causes.

original: nges pas na bya ba sgrub par byed pa de ni yod kyang de la zhes byed pa po de rnams kyi nang nas gang zhig bya ba la chod pa med pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa dam pa ste byed pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pas na bya ba sgrub par byed pa de ni yod kyang de la zhes byed pa po de rnams kyi nang nas gang zhig bya ba la chod pa med pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa dam pa ste byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that performance of action, although existing, is that very one among those agents that is uninterrupted in action. That is the highest performance, the agent.

original: ma thob na zhes bya ba ni mi ldan na de'i tshe de'i rnam pa can gyi zhes bya ba yul thag ring ba la sogs par gnas pa'i don rnam par mi gnas so //
analyzed: ma thob na zhes bya ba ni mi ldan na de'i tshe de'i rnam pa can gyi zhes bya ba yul thag ring ba la sogs par gnas pa'i don rnam par mi gnas so //
translated: If not obtained means if not possessed, then the form of that does not abide in the object that is far away, etc.

original: de dang bar mchod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang bar mchod par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba don yongs su gcod par bya ba yin no //ğŸ”½shes pa de'i rnam pa'i khyad @251a * //
analyzed: de dang bar mchod pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang bar mchod par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba don yongs su gcod par bya ba yin no // shes pa de'i rnam pa'i khyad @251a * //
translated: And the meaning of â€œinterrupted by thatâ€ is that the aspect is interrupted by that.

original: par gang yin pa de las myong ba'i yul yin no zhes shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: par gang yin pa de las myong ba'i yul yin no zhes shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: The object that is the experience of whatever is the special aspect of that consciousness is to be understood.

original: rgyu de'i phyir na ma nyams pa de ni rnam pas chod pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir na ma nyams pa de ni rnam pas chod pa yin no //
translated: For that reason, the nondeficiency of the object is the nondeficiency of the aspect.

original: gal te rnam pa nges pas grub na ni de'i tshe don de nyid don rnam par 'dzeg pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa nges pas grub na ni de'i tshe don de nyid don rnam par 'dzeg pa yin te /
translated: If the object is established by the determination of the aspect, then at that time the object itself is the determination of the object,

original: rnam pa nges pa grub ba las don gnas pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa nges pa grub ba las don gnas pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other basis for the object apart from the established determination of the aspect.

original: de las gzhan nyams pa med pa ni don rnam par gnas pa las rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan nyams pa med pa ni don rnam par gnas pa las rgyu ma yin no //
translated: The nondeficiency of that is not the cause of the determination of the object.

original: gal te de lta na yang nyams pa med pa tshad mar 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang nyams pa med pa tshad mar 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that even so, nondeficiency is valid knowledge,

analyzed: don gnas pa grub zin pa la nyams pa med pas ci zhig rgyas par byed /
translated: then what is established by the nondeficiency of the established object?

original: grub pa nye bar 'jog pa ni /
analyzed: grub pa nye bar 'jog pa ni /
translated: The establishment of the object is

original: rnam par gnas pa la ma kho ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa la ma kho ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It does not mean that it is not a valid cognition with regard to the object that is its own nature.

original: de grub na zhes bya ba ni rnam par nges pa grub na'o //
analyzed: de grub na zhes bya ba ni rnam par nges pa grub na'o //
translated: If that is established, if ascertainment is established.

original: da ni slob dpon chos mchog gi lugs sun phyung ba'i don du nye bar 'god pa ni /
analyzed: da ni slob dpon chos mchog gi lugs sun phyung ba'i don du nye bar 'god pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to refute the system of Master Dharmottara, he states:

original: de'i rnam pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Its aspect is also.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba goms pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba goms pa'i dus na'o //
translated: At that time, at the time of cultivation.

original: des na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad mar ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad mar ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, because it does not exist, how can it be a valid cognition?

original: de yang ni rjes su dpag pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang ni rjes su dpag pa yang ngo //

original: de bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa yang gzhan ni ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: de bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa yang gzhan ni ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: Similarly, it is not that there is another uncommon [cognition].

original: yang ji ltar na rnam pa las gzhan thun mong ma yin par mi 'gyur snyam du dogs pa bsu nas kun gyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yang ji ltar na rnam pa las gzhan thun mong ma yin par mi 'gyur snyam du dogs pa bsu nas kun gyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: Also, how could it not be uncommon, different from the aspect? Anticipating this doubt, he says of all.

original: shes pa kun gyi'o /
analyzed: shes pa kun gyi'o /
translated: Of all cognitions.

original: gal te sngon po de ser po dang de gnyis ma yin pa'i yul la yang dbang po de nyid ma yin nam de dbang po rnams tha dad pa ni 'ga' yang nye bar mtshon pa med do //
analyzed: gal te sngon po de ser po dang de gnyis ma yin pa'i yul la yang dbang po de nyid ma yin nam de dbang po rnams tha dad pa ni 'ga' yang nye bar mtshon pa med do //
translated: But isn't that sense faculty also the sense faculty for the blue, the yellow, and the object that is neither of those two?

original: des na dbang po gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba ma yin nam zhes brjod ces dogs pa bsu nas pa rol po nyid brjod pa ni de la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na dbang po gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba ma yin nam zhes brjod ces dogs pa bsu nas pa rol po nyid brjod pa ni de la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: To anticipate that qualm, he says in that regard, and so on.

original: sngon po dang ser po dang de gnyi ga yang ma yin pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po dang de gnyi ga yang ma yin pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
translated: It is directed toward the blue, the yellow, and the object that is neither of those two.

original: khyad par zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i yul mngon par phyogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa de dag gi rnam pa gang yin pa de tha dad pa med par ro //
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i yul mngon par phyogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa de dag gi rnam pa gang yin pa de tha dad pa med par ro //
translated: The distinction is the direction toward the object, such as blue or yellow. This is the aspect of those, such as the blue or the yellow, that is undifferentiated.

analyzed: de tha dad pa yin yang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du phyogs pa tha dad pa yin yang ngo //
translated: Even though it is differentiated means that even though the direction is differentiated.

original: rnam pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba 'di dbang po'o //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba 'di dbang po'o //
translated: â€œDevoid of aspectsâ€ means devoid of the aspects of objects.

original: gal te sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i khyad par rtogs pa yod pa nyid /
analyzed: gal te sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i khyad par rtogs pa yod pa nyid /
translated: If there is a cognition of the distinctions of blue, yellow, etc.,

original: des na mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes @251b gal te yod na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes @251b gal te yod na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then there would be a cognition of the distinctions of the manifest.

original: sngon po dang ser bo la sogs pa'i khyad par yod na'o //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser bo la sogs pa'i khyad par yod na'o //
translated: If there were blue, yellow, etc.,

analyzed: de las bzlog bar zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid las bzlog par ro //
translated: then there would be a reversal of the position that the object is devoid of the distinctions of blue, yellow, etc.

original: snang bzhin pa'i sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa nyid shes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa mi bzod pas pha rol po 'dri ba ni /ğŸ”½'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang bzhin pa'i sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa nyid shes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa mi bzod pas pha rol po 'dri ba ni / 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since the opponent cannot accept that blue, yellow, etc., which are manifest, are by nature cognition, he asks:

original: gal te bde ba dang sngon po la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa shes pa ma dmigs na /
analyzed: gal te bde ba dang sngon po la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa shes pa ma dmigs na /
translated: â€œWell then, if there is no cognition apart from pleasure, pain, etc.,ğŸ”½if cognition is not perceived apart from blue, yellow, etc.,

original: lkog tu gyur pa nyid du 'gyur la de ste bltar rung ba yin na ni med pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa nyid du 'gyur la de ste bltar rung ba yin na ni med pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were visible, it would not exist.

original: lkog gyur min zhes bya ba ni gsal bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lkog gyur min zhes bya ba ni gsal bzhin nyid do //
translated: Not hidden means manifest.

original: gal te de la shes pa yin no zhes brjod na /
analyzed: gal te de la shes pa yin no zhes brjod na /
translated: If you say that it is consciousness,

original: de'i tshe lkog tu gyur pa nyid ces bya ba'i ming can gsal bzhin pa nyid shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe lkog tu gyur pa nyid ces bya ba'i ming can gsal bzhin pa nyid shes pa yin no //
translated: then the manifest itself, which is called â€œnot hidden,â€ is consciousness.

original: shes pa gzhan gyis ci bya /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan gyis ci bya /
translated: What use is another consciousness?

original: yang ji ltar na lkog tu gyur pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na lkog tu gyur pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it that the hidden is known?

original: don gnas na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gnas na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the object exists,

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni gsal bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni gsal bzhin pa'o //
translated: this means the manifest.ğŸ”½If it does not exist,

original: med pa yang zhes bya ba ni shes pa med pa yang ngo //
analyzed: med pa yang zhes bya ba ni shes pa med pa yang ngo //
translated: this means the absence of consciousness.

original: gal te de lta na sngon po la sogs pa las gsal bzhin pa'i shes pa ni gzhan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na sngon po la sogs pa las gsal bzhin pa'i shes pa ni gzhan yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, the manifest consciousness of blue and so on is different.

original: nyams su myong ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says â€œexperience.â€

original: de ni zhes bya ba lkog tu ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba lkog tu ma gyur pa'o //
translated: That means not hidden.

original: 'o na gsal bzhin pa ni shes pa yin pa'i phyir don zhes bya ba med par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: 'o na gsal bzhin pa ni shes pa yin pa'i phyir don zhes bya ba med par 'gyur ro ;
translated: But if it is manifest, it is consciousness, and therefore there would be no object.

original: / de'i zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: / de'i zhes gsungs te /
translated: The response to that is:

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa'i'o //
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa'i'o //
translated: â€œThat which is not hiddenâ€

original: me long gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de la bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lkog tu gyur pa las sngon po yang de yin no //
analyzed: me long gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de la bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lkog tu gyur pa las sngon po yang de yin no //
translated: Just as a reflection of a face in a mirror is a face, so too, that which is not hidden is blue, etc.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni gsal bzhin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni gsal bzhin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'o //
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to manifest blue, etc.ğŸ”½But isnâ€™t it understood that the aspect is the nature of an inanimate object?

original: gal te rnam pa de ni bems po'i rang bzhin du rtogs so zhes brjod pa ma yin nam snyam na 'di la brjod pa ni rang nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rnam pa de ni bems po'i rang bzhin du rtogs so zhes brjod pa ma yin nam snyam na 'di la brjod pa ni rang nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is: â€œitself.â€

original: gal te lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid don las yin mod /
analyzed: gal te lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid don las yin mod /
translated: If it is not hidden, it is from the object.

original: de lta na yang don gyis bskyed pa lkog tu gyur pa ni don gyi rang bzhin nyid du 'thad kyi /
analyzed: de lta na yang don gyis bskyed pa lkog tu gyur pa ni don gyi rang bzhin nyid du 'thad kyi /
translated: But even if that is so, it is tenable that what is generated by the object and is not hidden is the nature of the object itself.

original: shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: It is not the nature of consciousness.

original: gal te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te zhes gsungs so //
translated: If that is so, it is said.

original: gal te rnam pa 'di bag chags kyi stobs las skyes su chug mod /ğŸ”½de lta na yang 'di ni don kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa 'di bag chags kyi stobs las skyes su chug mod / de lta na yang 'di ni don kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: Even if you grant that the aspect is produced by the power of latent impressions,ğŸ”½still, the object itself exists.

original: don ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: don ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: The response to that is â€œThe object itself . . .

original: de zhes bya ba don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: â€ because it would follow that the word â€œthatâ€ would be meaningless.

original: bag chags kyi khyad par gang gis sad par mthong ba'i rnam pa don gyis stong par mi 'gyur @252a * //
analyzed: bag chags kyi khyad par gang gis sad par mthong ba'i rnam pa don gyis stong par mi 'gyur @252a * //
translated: The latent impressions that are the cause of the appearance of the aspect do not exist as the object itself.ğŸ”½The aspect is seen as if it were an external object, but it is not an external object.

original: ba de la yod pa yin no //ğŸ”½'di las ni rnam pa'o //ğŸ”½bag chags de nyid las so //ğŸ”½rnam pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ba de la yod pa yin no // 'di las ni rnam pa'o // bag chags de nyid las so // rnam pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The aspect is the aspect that is seen.ğŸ”½The latent impressions are the cause of the appearance of the aspect.

original: sad par mthong ba'i rnam pa'o //ğŸ”½gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sad par mthong ba'i rnam pa'o // gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The aspect itself is the aspect that is seen.

original: rmi lam du snang ba'i rnam pa ni don med pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rmi lam du snang ba'i rnam pa ni don med pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
translated: The other is the aspect that appears in a dream.

original: lan ni 'dir yang zhes bya ba ste /ğŸ”½sad pa mthong ba la yang ngo //

translated: The response is â€œThe same is true here as well.â€ğŸ”½The same is true of the aspect that is seen when one is awake.

analyzed: 'o na de'i rigs can yin pa'i phyir sad pas mthong ba'i rnam pa yang don dang bral ba nyid do zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar snang ngo zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa nyid du'o //

original: khyed la yang ni sangs rgyas pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: khyed la yang ni sangs rgyas pa la yang ngo //
translated: â€œFor youâ€ means for the Buddhist.

original: tshad ma ci yod ces bya ba ni blo don gyi rnam pa can du sgrub par byed pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: tshad ma ci yod ces bya ba ni blo don gyi rnam pa can du sgrub par byed pa ci yod ce na /

original: 'di la brjod pa ni tha mi dad par zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni tha mi dad par zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: The response to this is â€œbecause they are not different.â€

original: / de ni zhes bya ba tha mi dad par dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: / de ni zhes bya ba tha mi dad par dmigs pa'o //
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to the observation of nondifference.

original: don thob pa'i phyir shes pa don gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i gnod byed yin no zhes 'di 'gog pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don thob pa'i phyir shes pa don gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i gnod byed yin no zhes 'di 'gog pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Because the object is obtained, the cognition is the aspect of the object. This is the refutation, but it is not the case that this is refuted.

analyzed: lhag ma zhes bya ba ni dbang po rnams las lhag mar gyur pa'o //

analyzed: rnam pa las 'das te zhes bya ba ni rnam pa la mi ltos par zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: khyad par can la brten pa'i rang bzhin nyid khyad par yin mod /

analyzed: de lta na yang khyad par can ma rtogs par ji ltar mi 'dzin snyam na /

analyzed: khyad par can la brten pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ma bzung bar khyad par 'dzin par cir 'gyur /

analyzed: de'i rnam pa zhes bya ba khyad par can la brten pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin na yang ngo //

analyzed: khyad par 'dzin par byed pa'i blo gang yin pa des bskyed pa'i 'dzin par byed pa gang yin @252b pa de'i gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //

analyzed: de 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par 'dzin pa don med do //

original: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /

original: sgrub par byed nyid med par thal //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed nyid med par thal // zhes bya ba'o //

original: don gcig la zlos pa ste rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de'i bye brag gi shes pa rnams kyi rim par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /

analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: shes pa snga ma dang phyi ma khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //

original: lan ni don zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni don zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is â€œThe object.â€

original: de nyid ni mig gi gzung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni mig gi gzung ba nyid do //

original: de dang sbyor ba na zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dang ngo //

original: kha dog kyang gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //

analyzed: mi 'dzin pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni dbyibs tsam yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de lta bur gyur par zhes bya ba ni la lar ni 'gyur la lar ni ma yin @253a * // pa'o zhes bya bar ro //
translated: â€œIn that wayâ€ means that sometimes it does and sometimes it does not.

original: lan ma yin te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ma yin te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: â€œIt is not a responseâ€ means that

analyzed: mdog dbyibs dag las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir na /

analyzed: gal te bar yul nyid ma yin na /
translated: The meaning is

original: de zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'o //
translated: â€œ Thatâ€ refers to the immediately preceding condition.

original: de lta bu nyid du shes pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni /

original: ji ltar phyi'i don du smra ba'i ltar na sngon po'i rnam pa myong ba nyid sngon po myong ba yin pa bzhin du sngon po'i rnam pa dran pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar phyi'i don du smra ba'i ltar na sngon po'i rnam pa myong ba nyid sngon po myong ba yin pa bzhin du sngon po'i rnam pa dran pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Just as, according to the proponents of external objects, the experience of the aspect of blue is the experience of blue, and the memory of the aspect of blue is the memory of blue, and not anything else.

analyzed: 'di ltar dang po ni sngon nyams su myong bar 'gyur la phyis sngon po goms pa'i mtha' thug pa na /

analyzed: dper na che ge mo'i khyim dang bar mchod pa ni bde byed kyi khyim yin no //

analyzed: de 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni / der ni khyim gzhan gyis bar ma chod pas na bar med pa zhes brjod kyi /
translated: The phrase â€œlike thatâ€ refers toğŸ”½the absence of an interval between houses.

analyzed: skye shi la sogs pas bar ma chod pa ni ma yin no //

original: gal te de ltar bar med par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bar med par 'gyur mod /

original: 'di la lan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: yang ji ltar 'di la lan btab pa snyam na bar du zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams gang zhig goms pa las de ma thag tu gsal ba'i rnam pa can skyed par byed pa de yul du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar rnam par 'khrul pa'i rgyu des na'o //

original: gal te don gnas pa ni nges pa las yin na /

original: de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la 'di la brjod pa ni /

original: zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba dang 'brel to /

original: ji ltar nges pa las don rnam par gnas she na /

original: gal te don nges pa yin mod /
analyzed: gal te don nges pa yin mod /
translated: If the object is ascertained,

original: de lta na yang ji ltar nges pa las don rnam par gnas she na /
analyzed: de lta na yang ji ltar nges pa las don rnam par gnas she na /

original: don nyams su myong ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: don nyams su myong ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said that the object is experienced.

original: mngon sum de las gzhan pa'i rnam par rtog pa de bas zhan pa'i don de mthong ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzu lums yin no //ğŸ”½de de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te don nyams su myong ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mngon sum de las gzhan pa'i rnam par rtog pa de bas zhan pa'i don de mthong ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzu lums yin no // de de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te don nyams su myong ba ni ma yin gyi /

original: 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo myong ba kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo myong ba kho na yin na /

original: 'di 'gog pa ni de ni de lta ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'gog pa ni de ni de lta ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation of that is â€œThat is not so.â€

original: gal te goms pa de yang myong ba nyid las 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te goms pa de yang myong ba nyid las 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: If that familiarity were to arise from the experience of that,

original: des na 'ga' zhig gi tshe gdon mi za bar don nyams su myong bar 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig gi tshe gdon mi za bar don nyams su myong bar 'gyur dgos so //
translated: then at some time, it would be necessary that the object be experienced.

original: des na 'di phyin ci log tu ji ltar nges she na /ğŸ”½'di la brjod @255a * //
analyzed: des na 'di phyin ci log tu ji ltar nges she na / 'di la brjod @255a * //
translated: So how could that ascertainment be mistaken?

original: pa ni 'di yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa ni 'di yang zhes bya ba'o //

original: phyin ci log tu nges pa ni mthong ba yang yin te /
analyzed: phyin ci log tu nges pa ni mthong ba yang yin te /
translated: Ascertainment as mistaken is also seen.

original: bdag la sogs par nges pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bdag la sogs par nges pa bzhin no //

original: gal te blta ba'i shes bar 'byed par mi byed na /
analyzed: gal te blta ba'i shes bar 'byed par mi byed na /

original: de'i tshe nges pa yang rang nyid nus pa med par ji ltar byed /
analyzed: de'i tshe nges pa yang rang nyid nus pa med par ji ltar byed /
translated: then how can ascertainment, which is powerless by itself, do so?

analyzed: ji ltar zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa yod na skye ba'i nges pa ma yin pa de rnam par 'byang bar mi byed pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as the cognition of two moons, when it occurs, does not cause the differentiation of the non-ascertainment.

original: rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu med can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu med can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not a cause means because it is causeless.

original: gang gi tshe so sor nges par nyams su myong ba nyid ma grub pa de'i goms pa yang ji ltar 'grub ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi tshe so sor nges par nyams su myong ba nyid ma grub pa de'i goms pa yang ji ltar 'grub ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: When the experience of the individual is not established, how can the cultivation of it be established?

analyzed: 'dri ba'i don gang zhig yin zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba 'di mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: mi 'thad pa de nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To show that it is not tenable, it says â€œin this way.â€

original: slar bzlog pa rnam par brjod pa ni don la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: slar bzlog pa rnam par brjod pa ni don la zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: 'on te rang bzhin dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur na de'i tshe 'di ni thams cad snyam par de 'jigs par byed par 'gyur ro //

original: gal te 'gal ba med na 'o na ral gri'i so yang bdag nyid kyis gcod par 'gyur ro zhe na //
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba med na 'o na ral gri'i so yang bdag nyid kyis gcod par 'gyur ro zhe na //
translated: If there is no contradiction, then even the edge of a sword would cut itself.

original: chad pa ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: chad pa ni zhes smos so //
translated: He says, â€œThe cutting . . . â€

original: 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis bskyed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis bskyed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
translated: â€œThis is just itâ€ means that it is not produced by itself. Such is its nature.

original: de'i tshe 'thad par 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba rang nyid gsal ba sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'thad par 'gyur gyi zhes bya ba rang nyid gsal ba sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: â€œThen it would be tenableâ€ clarifies itself.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi rgyu las rang gsal ba'i rang bzhin du skyes na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi rgyu las rang gsal ba'i rang bzhin du skyes na'o //
translated: â€œNot otherwiseâ€ means that it is produced from its own cause with the nature of being self-illuminating.

original: don de ma thag gsal ba ni des don gzhan gsal lo zhes bya ba'i brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don de ma thag gsal ba ni des don gzhan gsal lo zhes bya ba'i brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the meaning is immediately clear, then it cannot be said that it is made clear by that.

original: gal te don gsal zhe na ni don de yang shes pa de lta bu nyid du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te don gsal zhe na ni don de yang shes pa de lta bu nyid du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it is said that the meaning is clear, then the meaning is that the meaning is just like that cognition.

original: gzhan gyis ni shes pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni shes pas so //
translated: By another, it is by a cognition.

original: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba gnyi ga gsal ba'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba gnyi ga gsal ba'i dus na'o //
translated: At that time, when both are clear.

original: gsal bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsal bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That which is to be made clear,

original: gsal bya nyid du 'dod pa'i don //
analyzed: gsal bya nyid du 'dod pa'i don //
translated: the meaning that is asserted to be that which is to be made clear.

original: gsal byed ces bya ba ni gsal byed du 'dod pa ni shes pa dag gsal ba nyid du khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal byed ces bya ba ni gsal byed du 'dod pa ni shes pa dag gsal ba nyid du khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: That which makes clear, the cognition that is asserted to be the maker of that which is to be made clear, does not have any difference in being that which is made clear.

original: de'i byed pa las zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i byed pa las so //
analyzed: de'i byed pa las zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i byed pa las so //
translated: From its activity, from the activity of cognition.

original: de las ni don la rim gyis rtogs pa rtogs pa nyid khyad par yod pa'o //
analyzed: de las ni don la rim gyis rtogs pa rtogs pa nyid khyad par yod pa'o //
translated: From that, the understanding of the meaning in sequence has a difference.

original: pha rol po 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'di ltar zhes ba ba'o //ğŸ”½de'i ni bum pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol po 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'di ltar zhes ba ba'o // de'i ni bum pa'o //
translated: This opponent makes it clear in this way.ğŸ”½That is the pot.

original: rgyu des na bum pa @257a * //
analyzed: rgyu des na bum pa @257a * //
translated: By that cause, the pot.

original: dang sgron ma de gnyis de nyid de gsal bya dang gsal byed nyid yin na 'di la brjod pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dang sgron ma de gnyis de nyid de gsal bya dang gsal byed nyid yin na 'di la brjod pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If those two lamps are the very reality, the object of illumination and the illuminator, then this is said:

analyzed: gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid du skyes par ci steng mi 'dod na /
translated: Why is it not accepted that they are born as the very nature of illumination?

original: de kho na ltar skye bar rigs so //
analyzed: de kho na ltar skye bar rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable that they are born in that way.

original: des na de la gsal bya gsal byed nyed ci zhig yod /
analyzed: des na de la gsal bya gsal byed nyed ci zhig yod /

original: khyad par zhes bya ba ni sgron mas byas pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba ni sgron mas byas pa'o //
translated: â€œ Distinctionsâ€ are made by the lamp.

original: 'on te rang nyid ces bya ba de nyid 'grel pa ni tha snyad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te rang nyid ces bya ba de nyid 'grel pa ni tha snyad ces bya ba'o //
translated: â€œ Or itselfâ€ is the commentary. â€œ Conventionâ€ is the name.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni nyams su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni nyams su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is said: â€œexperience.â€

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni shes pa ltar ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni shes pa ltar ro //
translated: â€œ In that wayâ€ is as consciousness.

original: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi tshe rig par ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi tshe rig par ro //
translated: â€œ In every wayâ€ is at all times.

original: des na rig par bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa yang 'thad pa yang 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rig par bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa yang 'thad pa yang 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is also tenable that the object of illumination is hidden.

original: gal te shes pa bzhin du phyi rol yang thams cad kyi tshe rig pa nyid yin na ni de'i tshe shes pa dang / shes bya dag khyad par 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te shes pa bzhin du phyi rol yang thams cad kyi tshe rig pa nyid yin na ni de'i tshe shes pa dang / shes bya dag khyad par 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If external objects are cognized like consciousness, then at that time there would be no difference at all between consciousness and the object of consciousness.

original: des na phyi rol gyi dngos po rig par bya ba ma yin pa yang spong ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: des na phyi rol gyi dngos po rig par bya ba ma yin pa yang spong ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, external things that are not cognized are also excluded.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni de ni mi 'thad de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni de ni mi 'thad de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is, â€œThat is not tenable.â€

original: rig bya min la zhes bya ba ni rig par bya ba ma yin pa nyid rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: rig bya min la zhes bya ba ni rig par bya ba ma yin pa nyid rtogs so zhe na /
translated: If you say, â€œIt is understood that it is not to be cognized,â€

original: brjod pa rig par bya ba nyid med na rig pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: brjod pa rig par bya ba nyid med na rig pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: we respond, â€œIf it is not to be cognized, how could it be cognized?â€

original: gal te mngon sum gcig gis ma rtogs pa rjes su dpogs pas rtogs zhes bya ba 'di 'chad pa ci yod snyam na de yang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gcig gis ma rtogs pa rjes su dpogs pas rtogs zhes bya ba 'di 'chad pa ci yod snyam na de yang zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you think, â€œWhat is the explanation for the statement, â€˜What is not directly perceived is perceived by inferenceâ€™?â€ he says, â€œThat also is not tenable.â€

original: don gzhan med do zhes bya ba kho bo cag gi phyogs yin gyi don de la mngon sum gyis rtogs par byas pa nyid 'ba' zhig yod do zhes bya ba ni phyogs ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan med do zhes bya ba kho bo cag gi phyogs yin gyi don de la mngon sum gyis rtogs par byas pa nyid 'ba' zhig yod do zhes bya ba ni phyogs ma yin te /
translated: There is no other object, this is our position. But it is not our position that there is only the cognition of that object by direct perception.

analyzed: de ltar yin dang rtogs bzhin pa las don gzhan ni med do zhes bya ba 'di la chad pa ci yod /

original: yang na mngon sum gyis rtogs par bya ba nyid 'ba' zhig yod do zhes bya ba'i phyogs la yang nyes pa med do zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: yang na mngon sum gyis rtogs par bya ba nyid 'ba' zhig yod do zhes bya ba'i phyogs la yang nyes pa med do zhes ston pa ni /
translated: Or else, the following shows that there is no fault in the position that there is only the cognition of the object by direct perception.

original: rjes su dpag pa las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not like inference.

original: de lta ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rang nyid kyis phyis mthong ba'o //
translated: that it is seen later by itself.

original: de las ni gzung ba las so //
analyzed: de las ni gzung ba las so //
translated: From that means from the object.

original: 'di 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //

original: rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i rnam pa la tha dad pa'i don ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½ma rtogs kyang yod do zhe na /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzung ba'i rnam pa la tha dad pa'i don ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro // ma rtogs kyang yod do zhe na /
translated: Because of the cognition means because of the non-cognition of a different object in the aspect of the object.

original: ma rtogs pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you say that it exists even though it is not cognized,ğŸ”½then it is not cognized.

original: ma rtogs pa nyid ma grub ste rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa nyid ma grub ste rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if you say that non-apprehension is not established because it is apprehended by inference, then we reply:

original: mngon du byed pa ma @257b yin pa kho nar rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa des na /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa ma @257b yin pa kho nar rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa des na /

original: mngon sum du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How then can it be manifest?ğŸ”½We reply:

original: 'di la smras pa ni de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la smras pa ni de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not manifest.

original: mngon du byed pas ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa na mngon du byed pa nyid bkag pa yin la rtogs so zhes brjod pa na ni de nyid bsgrubs pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon du byed pas ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa na mngon du byed pa nyid bkag pa yin la rtogs so zhes brjod pa na ni de nyid bsgrubs pa yin te /
translated: When we say that it is not manifest, we deny that it is manifest. When we say that it is apprehended, we affirm that it is apprehended.

original: de lta ma yin pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, there would be no apprehension.

original: sgrub pa dang dgag pa 'di yang gcig nyid 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang dgag pa 'di yang gcig nyid 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: And this affirmation and denial are not tenable in the same thing.ğŸ”½How are they not tenable?

original: ji ltar mi 'thad snyam na don ci yin zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'thad snyam na don ci yin zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: We reply: What is the meaning of this?

original: ci yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ci yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is nothing at all.

original: rang gi ngo bor ma rtogs pa la ni rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa med pa'i phyir gzung ba las tha dad pa'i phyi rol gyi don ci ltar khas len zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor ma rtogs pa la ni rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa med pa'i phyir gzung ba las tha dad pa'i phyi rol gyi don ci ltar khas len zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The point is that, since there is no realization of the object by way of inference for one who has not realized its nature, how can one accept external objects that are different from the object that is apprehended?

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de'i tshe myong ba'i rgyu las sngon po'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni ser po la ltos to /
translated: At that time, the entity that is the nature of blue, which is the cause of experience, is dependent on yellow.

original: rang bzhin tha dad par ci ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad par ci ltar 'gyur te /

analyzed: myong ba'i dbang gis sngon po dang ser po dag tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: yang ji ltar tha dad par mi 'thad snyam na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar tha dad par mi 'thad snyam na /
translated: Again, how is it that difference is not tenable?

original: rtogs pa'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: â€œBy the difference in the realizationâ€ is stated.

original: des na rtogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad par 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: des na rtogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad par 'gyur dgos so //
translated: Therefore, it must be that they are different by virtue of the difference in the realization.

original: shes pa gzhan tha dad par ni tshad mas 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa gzhan tha dad par ni tshad mas 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not tenable by valid knowledge that there is a difference of other consciousnesses.

original: de dang 'brel pas ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pas ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na /
translated: Since it is related to that, it is the nature of consciousness.

original: de nyid na zhes pas tha dad na don tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid na zhes pas tha dad na don tha dad pa'o //
translated: â€œIn that caseâ€ means that if they are different, they are different objects.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni shes pa las don gzhan yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni shes pa las don gzhan yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: Here, the response is: How could an object exist that is different from consciousness?

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni de dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni de dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is clarified by â€œThat,â€

original: shes pa dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pa'i don ni /
analyzed: shes pa dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pa'i don ni /
translated: which means that an object that is simultaneous with consciousness

analyzed: shes pa de las gzhan par ga la 'gyur te /

original: 'di la tshad ma med de zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la tshad ma med de zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las shes pa dang don tha dad par so sor rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las shes pa dang don tha dad par so sor rtogs so zhe na /
translated: If you think that consciousness and objects are individually understood from positive and negative concomitance,

original: 'di la brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the response is â€œNo.â€

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rjes su dpag pas rtogs so zhe na 'di 'gog pa ni min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rjes su dpag pas rtogs so zhe na 'di 'gog pa ni min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that positive and negative concomitance are understood through inference, the response is â€œNo.â€

original: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yin na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can nyid yin na /
translated: Inference is preceded by perception.

original: dngos po grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not established that things exist.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o //ğŸ”½khyab par byed pa'i don med par @258a * //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o // khyab par byed pa'i don med par @258a * //
translated: â€œIfâ€ is the purpose.ğŸ”½How can there be the cognition of the pervaded without the object of the pervader?

analyzed: khyab par bya ba'i shes pa yod par ji ltar 'di la brjod pa ni ma rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba'o //

original: de tshe zhes bya ba don grub pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba don grub pa'i dus su'o //
translated: â€œAt that timeâ€ is the time of establishing the meaning.

original: gal te de'i dus bar ma rtogs na 'o na sngar khyab par byed pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs yul dang dus rang bzhin khyab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te de'i dus bar ma rtogs na 'o na sngar khyab par byed pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs yul dang dus rang bzhin khyab pa'i phyir /

original: khyab par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //

translated: If the cognition â€œThe object exists nowâ€ arises previously,

analyzed: de las khyab par byed pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs des na sngar yang rtogs pa tsam kho na yin gyi /

analyzed: don rtogs pa ni ma yin no //

analyzed: 'di la gzhan gyis gal te zhes smras so //

original: ji ltar du ba me med na mi 'byung ba de bzhin du me'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa yang me med par yang mi 'dod do /
analyzed: ji ltar du ba me med na mi 'byung ba de bzhin du me'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa yang me med par yang mi 'dod do /
